Title: Relates to expanding the definition of massage therapy to include additional related services and to require the licensee of a massage therapy location to be on premises at all times during business hours
Summary: Relates to expanding the definition of massage therapy to include additional related services and to require the licensee of a massage therapy location to be on premises at all times during business hours.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to expanding the definition of massage therapy to include other related services and requiring the licensee of a massage therapy location be on the premises at all times during business hours
